Category:Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire

nodes.text: Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire Limited Collector's Edition

The Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire Limited Collector's Edition is a December 1996 strategy guide released by Ziff-Davis Publishing, in cooperation with Electronic Gaming Monthly magazine. Authored by Crispin Boyer, the strategy guide offers a step-by-step tutorial to mastering the Nintendo 64 video game Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire, as well as behind-the-scenes insight into LucasArts' production of the game and a look at accompanying merchandise from the Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire multimedia series.
